meanings.definition: A rare mineral, a strontium-vanadium phosphate hydrate with formula SrV3+3(PO4)2(OH)·2H2O.
meanings.english_definition: A rare mineral, a strontium-vanadium phosphate hydrate with formula SrV3+3(PO4)2(OH)·2H2O.

etymology.value: Named after Cecil, a common given name, with "-ite" suffix indicating a mineral.
